duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide professional nail and skin care services to salon clientele.
Meet and exceed personal service and retail sales goals.
Recruit new clients and maintain customer client base.
Prescribe appropriate retail products and respond to customer service issues.
Maintain salon housekeeping duties and comply with state board regulations.
Participate in ongoing education and stay updated on industry trends.

education_certification.credential: Valid and current board certified license in cosmetology or cosmetic industry
Two to five years of experience in the cosmetology or cosmetic industry
